name: Allowance
tooltip: +100 gold

name: Press the Attack
tooltip: +80 mythium

name: Savior
tooltip: Heals your king by 10% + 15% of missing health, and +90 gold

name: Hero
tooltip: Gives a fighter an aura that buffs the attack speed and defense of adjacently-built units by 3.8%

name: Villain
tooltip: Gives a fighter damage-amplifying attacks, increasing damage taken from all sources by 20% (12% for ranged) (one-third against bosses).

name: Dark Ritual
tooltip: Damages your king by 20% of current health, and +145 gold

name: Investment
tooltip: +30 income

name: Giant Snail
tooltip: Your future Snails are replaced by Giant Snails that have 300 bonus health and 10 bonus damage

name: Venture
tooltip: Pay up to 105 gold now. Receive 3x that amount when wave 12 ends.

name: Loan
tooltip: +200 gold, -30 income

name: Sacrifice
tooltip: Refund a fighter for full value + 90 gold

name: Overwork
tooltip: Your workers gather mythium 60% faster until the end of wave 11. After that, they gather mythium 35% slower until the end of wave 12.

name: Sorcerer
tooltip: Increases a fighter's ability damage by 58%.

name: All Out Assault
tooltip: +110 mythium, -20 income

name: Magician
tooltip: Gives a fighter an aura that buffs the mana regeneration of adjacently-built units by 0.48 per second.

name: Vampire
tooltip: Gives a fighter an aura that grants 28% lifesteal and ability vamp to adjacently-built units

name: Creditor
tooltip: Gain 50% of your spare gold at the end of the build phase on waves 11-13. You can save up to a maximum of 180 spare gold per wave.

name: Pawn Shop
tooltip: You can now sell fighters for a 90% refund for the rest of the game. Also, +75 gold.

name: Pulverizer
tooltip: Gives this fighter the ability to stun every 3 attacks (5 for ranged) for 2.5 seconds (0.3 to bosses). Does not work on summons or clones.

name: Protector
tooltip: Gives a fighter +650 hp and an aura that buffs the health regeneration of all allies in a large area by 0.5% missing health until the fighter dies

name: Guardian Angel
tooltip: Gives a fighter a buff that brings it back to life after it dies. It will revive with up to 1500 health.

name: Embargo
tooltip: You can't send mercenaries or upgrade the king until after Wave 12 spawns. Then, +80 gold and +80 mythium. Mercenaries sent after/on wave 11 will be refunded.

name: Titan
tooltip: Gives a fighter +1350 hp.

name: Battle Scars
tooltip: After each wave, the fighter with the highest damage taken permanently gains +320 health and 3.5% attack speed.

name: Divine Blessing
tooltip: Gives a fighter +2000 health and +18% attack speed. If the fighter dies, the buff is permanently lost.

name: Counterattack
tooltip: Every time you leak, gain 60 Mythium. Also, +60 Mythium immediately.

name: Glacial Touch
tooltip: Gives a fighter a chilling attack that slows movement speed by 97% (80% against bosses) for 3 seconds. If the target dies while chilled, it explodes, dealing 48 pure damage in a small area.

name: Robo Squad
tooltip: Summons Robos to attack your lane opponent: 1x on Wave 11, 2x on Wave 12, and 3x on Wave 13. (No income). Also +40 Mythium.

name: Spread The Wealth
tooltip: +95 gold to your teammate

name: Executioner
tooltip: Makes a fighter a executioner. Executes enemies below 10% health (5% for ranged fighters) and gains 1-4 gold (based on wave number) on execute. Only works on the primary autoattack of the fighter.

name: Black Market
tooltip: Gain 56 income after Wave 13

name: Lizard Army
tooltip: Gain 56 income after Wave 13

name: Smite
tooltip: Gain 56 income after Wave 13
